title: Understanding Formula Auditing
text: Formula auditing is a process used in Excel to trace and evaluate the relationships between cells and formulas. It helps in identifying which cells are referenced by a formula and which formulas depend on a particular cell.

title: Purpose of Formula Auditing
text: The main purpose of formula auditing is to ensure the accuracy and integrity of your data by examining the dependencies and references within your spreadsheet.

hintAnswer: examining formulas to determine which cells are referenced by those formulas and examine cells to determine which formulas are built upon those cells
title: Identifying Cell References
text: When you audit a formula, you can see which cells are referenced by that formula. This helps in understanding how data flows through your spreadsheet.
choices: examining formulas to determine which cells are referenced by those formulas and examine cells to determine which formulas are built upon those cells
determining whether formulas make sense and are valid
making sure that formulas represent what they are supposed to
